statements: SELECT * FROM designs WHERE design_id = 1;
SELECT design_name, design_price FROM designs WHERE design_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE design_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT design_name, customer_preferences FROM designs WHERE design_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM designs ORDER BY design_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE design_id = 10;
SELECT design_name, design_price FROM designs WHERE design_id < 5 ORDER BY design_price DESC;
SELECT design_id, design_name FROM designs WHERE design_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND design_price > 100 ORDER BY design_id ASC;
SELECT design_name, design_price, customer_preferences FROM designs WHERE design_price < 500 AND customer_preferences->>'color' = 'blue';
SELECT design_name, design_file FROM designs WHERE design_price = (SELECT MAX(design_price) FROM designs);
SELECT * FROM designs;
SELECT design_name, price FROM designs WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT design_id, design_name FROM designs ORDER BY design_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE material_preference='Wood';
SELECT customer_id, design_id, color_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT design_id, design_name, price FROM designs WHERE designer_id = 101 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT design_name, price, designer_id FROM designs WHERE price < 500.00
SELECT * FROM designs JOIN customer_preferences ON designs.design_id = customer_preferences.design_id WHERE material_preference = 'Cotton'
SELECT design_name, color_preference FROM designs JOIN customer_preferences ON designs.design_id = customer_preferences.design_id WHERE designer_id = 201
SELECT design_id, design_name, designer_id, price FROM designs WHERE price BETWEEN 100.00 AND 200.00
SELECT * FROM designs;
SELECT design_id, design_name FROM designs ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT design_id, design_name FROM designs WHERE design_name ILIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT pricing_id, price FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference ASC;
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE design_name = 'ExampleDesign';
SELECT design_name, design_file FROM designs ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT design_id FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT design_name, price FROM designs INNER JOIN pricing_information ON designs.design_id = pricing_information.design_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference LIKE '%preferred%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Designs;
SELECT design_name, design_description FROM Designs WHERE design_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Pricing ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT design_id, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY design_id;

SELECT Orders.order_id, CustomerPreferences.customer_id, Orders.order_date FROM Orders INNER JOIN CustomerPreferences ON Orders.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id WHERE Orders.design_id = 1 AND CustomerPreferences.preferred_material = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM Designs;
SELECT design_name, design_description FROM Designs ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT design_name, base_price, discount_percent FROM Pricing WHERE base_price > 1000 AND discount_percent < 0.1;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, CustomerPreferences.preferred_material FROM Orders JOIN CustomerPreferences ON Orders.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id;
SELECT design_name, design_id, total_price FROM Designs JOIN Orders ON Designs.design_id = Orders.design_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM designs
SELECT id, name FROM designs WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, description FROM designs WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT name FROM designs WHERE name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, file_path FROM designs WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM designs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, file_path FROM designs WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE name LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT id, name FROM designs WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
